Post._content:
[Hexo](https://hexo.io/)  
Hexo[troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html)[GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
[cosy](https://mozzie.cn/posts/59577/)

## 

### 

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

### 

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

### 

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

### 

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

C++

,:

// class
void swap(int& a,int& b)      {int t=a;a=b;b=t;}
void swap(float& a,float& b)  {float t=a;a=b;b=t;}
void swap(bool& a,bool& b)    {bool t=b;a=b;b=t;}
// 
class printer{
    public:
       print(int a)   {cout<<a;}
       print(float a)   {cout<<a;}
       print(string a)   {cout<<a;}
};
//
int f(void){void}
float f(void){void}
//
signed main(){
    printer p;
    p.print(114514);
    p.print("\n1919810\n");
    int a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        swap(a,b);
        cout<<a<<' '<<b<<endl;
        return 0;
}

c++
= 

class node{  //
    private:
        int x,y; //
    public:
        void operator= (const node& n){  
            //const node& n node n
            //&constn
            x = n.x;    //  this->x = n.x;
            y = n.y;    //  this->y = n.y;
        }
        friend istream operator>>(istream& in,node& n){
            // 
            in>>n.x>>n.y;
            return in;
        }
};

signed main(){
node n;
    node m;
    cin >> n;
    m = n;
    // ...
    // 
    return 0
}


XD
public ( )



public

void

~


  • ______
  • ______

class node{
    private:
        int *n;    
    public:
        node();//
        node(int sum);          //
        ~node();                //
        node(const node& obj);  //
        int value(){
           return *n;
        }
};
node::node(){                  //::
    n = new int;                  //
    *n = 0;
}
node::node(int sum){
    n = new int;
    *n = sum;
}
node::~node(){
    delete n;                     //
}
node::node(const node& obj){
    n = new int;
    *n = *obj.n;                  //
}
int VALUE(node n){return n.value();} // II
node bigger_one(node a,node b){return a.value()>b.value() ? a : b ;}

    n = bigger_one(m,4);

// node.h
/**
 * @class node
 * @brief 
***/
class node{
    private:
        /**
         * @brief  \f$\left ( x,y \right )\f$
        ***/
        int x,y;
    public:
        /**
         * @brief 
         * @param a x
         * @param b y
        ***/
        void set(int a,int b){
           x = a;
           y = b;
        }
        /**
         * @brief 
         * @param n 
         * @return 
        ***/
        float dist(node n){
           return (this->x - n.x)*(this->x - n.x) + (this->y - n.y)*(this->y - n.y);
        }
};

// your_auto_file.cpp
#include "extensions.h"    // include pids.h
void turn(int deg){
  pids turning ;          // pid
  turning.pre(deg,10);    // pid
  float movement;         // pid
  Ine.calibrate();        // 
  while ( turning.check (Ine.heading(degrees)) )  {
                          // 
    movement = turning.moving();
    move(-movement *0.4,movement *0.4);
                          // 
  }
  
  stop(false);             // pidhold
  wait (0.8,sec);          // 
}

// class
void swap(int& a,int& b)      {int t=a;a=b;b=t;}
void swap(float& a,float& b)  {float t=a;a=b;b=t;}
void swap(bool& a,bool& b)    {bool t=b;a=b;b=t;}
// 
class printer{
    public:
       print(int a)   {cout<<a;}
       print(float a)   {cout<<a;}
       print(string a)   {cout<<a;}
};
//
int f(void){void}
float f(void){void}
//
signed main(){
    printer p;
    p.print(114514);
    p.print("\n1919810\n");
    int a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        swap(a,b);
        cout<<a<<' '<<b<<endl;
        return 0;
}

class node{
    private:
        int *n;    
    public:
        node();//
        node(int sum);          //
        ~node();                //
        node(const node& obj);  //
        int value(){
           return *n;
        }
};
node::node(){                  //::
    n = new int;                  //
    *n = 0;
}
node::node(int sum){
    n = new int;
    *n = sum;
}
node::~node(){
    delete n;                     //
}
node::node(const node& obj){
    n = new int;
    *n = *obj.n;                  //
}
int VALUE(node n){return n.value();} // II
node bigger_one(node a,node b){return a.value()>b.value() ? a : b ;}
